description: Celebrate Open House Festival 2021 with this fun and interactive family event about Britain's forgotten history of the Black Tudors.

events.name: The Mysterious Black Tudors - Family Trail
The Mysterious Black Tudors - Family Trail
The Mysterious Black Tudors - Family Trail

facilities: Family activities during open house festival

factsheet.heading: About the trail
paragraphs: Help us solve the mystery of the forgotten history of the Black Tudors. Join us on our search for clues as we visit some of London’s Tudor buildings and take a peek into the lives of five Black Tudors.
We will visit Westminster Abbey, The Palace of Whitehall and St James Palace with a short break in St James Park. Please note that this event does not include admission to any of these buildings.

factsheet.heading: Who is the event suitable for?
paragraphs: Ideally, for parents/guardians with children aged 7+, but all ages are welcome!

factsheet.heading: What Do I Need To Bring?
paragraphs: The event involves a fair amount of walking, but we do stop off outside buildings and have a break in St James Park. Therefore, it is advised that you bring some snacks/drinks with you and wear comfortable shoes and clothing.
We will provide children with activity packs and pens/pencils to complete. There are prizes for the Tudor sleuths too.

travel_info: Nearest train: Waterloo, Victoria, Charing Cross

name: The Mysterious Black Tudors - Family Trail
